archimate:Requirement.name: SM.1.2.2d: d) expected security behaviour of individuals (e.g. using strong passwords/passphrases, encrypting sensitive files and logging off endpoint devices when left unattended)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
